metadata.synopsis: A goblin taking part in a raid on a druid grove

0.speaker: Brawler Gurd
0.context: NodeContext: charging into combat or actively participating in combat. A warcry.

1.speaker: Brawler Gurd
1.text: Drow'll be pleased with us - proper good raid, that was.
1.context: NodeContext: Standing over the corpses of slaughtered enemies - pleased with himself, and his squad. Deferential toward the drow who was their commander
